name: Parting Shot
descriptionText: You are an expert skirmisher, able to rain missiles upon your enemies whether advancing or retreating.
benefitText: Once per encounter, when using the withdraw action, you can make a single ranged attack at any point during your movement.
normalText: You cannot attack when using the withdraw action.
specialText: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Parting Shot as a combat style feat.
